content: नाभि --भी {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [नह्-इञ् भश्चांतादेशः <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 125</ls>] {@--1@} The navel; गंगावर्तसनाभिर्नाभिः <ls>Dk. 2</ls>; &c.; निम्ननाभिः <ls>Me. 82</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 52</ls>; <ls>Me. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Any navel-like cavity. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} The nave of a wheel; <ls>Pt. 1. 81.</ls> {@--2@} The centre, focus, chief point. {@--3@} Chief, leader, head; कृत्स्नस्य नाभिर्नृपमंडलस्य <ls>R. 18. 20.</ls> {@--4@} Near relationship, community (of race &c.); as in सनाभि <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--5@} A paramount sovereign or lord; <ls>R. 9. 15.</ls> {@--6@} A near relation. {@--7@} A Kṣatriya. {@--8@} Home. --भिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} Musk. ({%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} मृगनाभि). ({%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} नाभि at the end of <ab>Bah.</ab> <ab>comp.</ab> becomes नाभ when the <ab>comp.</ab> is used as an epithet; as पद्मनाभः.)
